issue.title: Fix user guide to describe new usage of kp_velocity and provide description

content.raw:
#!/osrf/drcsim/src/c062c14af79a529d481c07be4ec1044f2baaf7d1/ros/atlas_msgs/AtlasPlugin.cpp?at=default#cl-2559

This code adds more effort in the same direction as the current velocity.  Is this intended to cancel internal damping in the physics engine?  otherwise, i'd have expected a negative (setpoint - current) velocity term here (implict setpoint=0).
content.html:
#!/osrf/drcsim/src/c062c14af79a529d481c07be4ec1044f2baaf7d1/ros/atlas_msgs/AtlasPlugin.cpp?at=default#cl-2559

This code adds more effort in the same direction as the current velocity. Is this intended to cancel internal damping in the physics engine? otherwise, i'd have expected a negative (setpoint - current) velocity term here (implict setpoint=0).
